name: My  ePathShala
description: With this application various segments can be benefited as:- a) Students : Can get Class Update, give quiz, Track attendance , can view performance report, lodge complaints/grievances.  b) Teachers : Can send information to their batch, give quiz, take attendance, assign task, keep track of projects.  c) Staff : Can send information/Time Table, Track attendance, address grievances, view fee details.  d) Parent/Guardian: Can view attendance of students, can view performance, lodge complaints.
